item.description:
Lets us join together and enjoy a day in NYC we will meet and take a train in the City, Then attend the later afternoon matinee at Radio City Music hall 11:30 head over to little Italy and have a yummy dinner take a nice walk around mid-town and enjoy the Christmas lights before we hop a train and come home.

Every performance of the Radio City Christmas Spectacular® presented by Capital One Bank is a glittering present full of fun and surprises for the whole family! Enjoy the flawless precision of the Radio City Rockettes® in numbers like legendary "Parade of the Wooden Soldiers" and thrill as Santa takes you on a magical ride to his workshop at the North Pole, where playful rag dolls come to life. Everyone marvels at the stunning reenactment of the first Christmas in the "Living Nativity".

Both brilliantly grand and genuinely moving, the Radio City Christmas Spectacular® creates family memories that last a lifetime!

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Radio City Music Hall " Radio City Christmas Spectacular
